items.headline: Easy Photo Editing in Pixelmator for Photographers, Web Designers, Social Media Managers, Entrepreneurs & Startup owners

items.title: How to Run & Scale Your DJ Business
items.headline: Turn your DJ business into a 6-7 figure income!
objectives_summary: This course is for DJs who know how to get a raging dance floor going and want their bank accounts to sing. You’ll discover the secrets to  getting off the ground and making your business legit. Mary takes you step by step through the tools and systems you need to run a well-oiled machine so you can charge premium prices for your entertainment services.  If you’re looking to expand from a single operator to a staff of DJs that work for you – Mary’s got you covered with everything from recruiting and hiring tips to effective management strategies and more!

items.title: YouTube Automation (Ultimate Course)
items.headline: Earn passive income on youtube without showing your face
objectives_summary: In this course, you will learn how youtube automation works how to hire employees that create the videos for you, and also what it needs to get a viral video. Skip all the wasted time of trial and error trying it on your own.
